Name: Lola - The Escape
About the game: Lola, the little cow was kidnapped by the Martians while she was sleeping. She helps her escape the 24 levels with more than 50 screens each, full of obstacles. The Martians did experiments on it. Her main ability is to float when she falls and an increased intelligence that helps her escape. This game is the prelude to a second part that will be a complete Metroidvania. Game Features: - Non-linear platform game. - Simple and precise control of the character. - 24 levels with more than 50 screens each. - Great variety of obstacles and challenges. - Hidden areas. - small cameos ... If you are an observer. - Supports Xbox control.
